rationale: High synergy between fast-food delivery and condiment consumption; Filfil can be an 'add-on' or featured dip for major burger chains.
recommended_approach: Exclusive 'Filfil Spicy Deal' where ordering specific spicy burgers includes a free Filfil taster pack or discount code.

rationale: Filfil sauces complement Kalleh's premium burgers and sausages. Both target a modern, quality-conscious demographic.
recommended_approach: Bundle 'BBQ Kits' in Refah and Hyperstar containing Kalleh frozen burgers and Filfil Honey-Q or Halo-Hot sauces.
timing: Summer grilling season and pre-Nowruz camping trips

rationale: Filfil's dip-style sauces (Avocado/Creamy French) are a perfect match for MazMaz potato chips, tapping into the snack-loving Gen Z market.
recommended_approach: In-store 'Dip & Crunch' displays placing Filfil sauces directly next to the snack aisle.
timing: Yalda Night (Shab-e Yalda) for family snacking
